name: Swift Strike
desc: You agilely attack with light weapons, rapidly covering ground and making a series of strikes.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make a _Light_ _Major Attack_.
* [_Flurry_ 2] with _Light_ _Minor Attacks_.
special: Determine _Speed Penalties_ as if this _Technique_ was played one _Phase_ later.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, you may make a _Light_/_Versatile_ _Attacks_.
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, [_Flurry_ 2] with _Light_ _Major Attacks_.

name: Basic Strike
desc: You move forward with a weapon, striking a nearby foe.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make a _Melee_ _Major Attack_. Inflict _Marked_ on the _Target_.
* Make a _Major Attack_, adding _Vulnerable_ 1 on a _Hit_+.
* Move is instead None. Make a _Major Attack_, then gain 1 _Momentum_ at the end of your _Turn_.

name: Strong Strike
desc: You unleash a powerful attack against a foe.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make a _Heavy_ _Major Attack_, adding [_Pierce_ 1] and, on a _Hit_+, _Push_ 2/_Vulnerable_ 1.
* Resolve your _Movement_, then make a _Charged Attack_. You must use a _Heavy_ _Major Attack_ for this.
special: Determine _Speed Penalties_ as if this _Technique_ was played one _Phase_ earlier.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, you may make a _Versatile_/_Heavy_ _Major Attack_.
* 1 _Momentum_: If you are _Charging_, add [_Unblockable_, _Overwhelming_ 1]. Remove the _Charging_ and _Hazard_ one _Phase_ later.
* 1 _Momentum_: On a _Hit_+, add _Prone_ [2 _Block_].

name: Rushing Strike
desc: You recklessly charge, covering ground before striking.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make a _Major Attack_ [_Glancing_].
* Make a _Minor Attack_. If you use a _Body_ _Attack_ and move at least 5 spaces prior to Attacking you may Attack at _Advantage_.

name: Combo Strike
desc: You unleash a series of more flexible attacks.

name: Hostile Strike
desc: A standard attack by an NPC.
effect:
Choose one:
* Make a _Major Attack_.
* Make two _Minor Attacks_.

name: Drawing Strike
desc: A standard attack by an NPC.

name: Fumigate
desc: A massive blast of chemical gas.
effect: Create a _Burst_ 1 or _Cone_ 3 _Hazard_, then begin _Charging_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove the _Hazard_ and attack all creatures in the _Area_ twice with _Toxic Spray_, ignoring its normal range. Those spaces become _Toxic Gas_ until the end of the _Round_.
